forecast.name: Monday

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely between 8am and 9am, then snow showers likely between 9am and 11am, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is open today and tomorrow from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. The Green, Red and Purple lifts will be on. The majority of the frontside runs are open. It's spitting rain this morning, but that is forecast to stop soon. Please be aware that following the ice storm there are many down trees, please stay to the open runs only. Pete Kehoe and friends will be playing the Nub's Pub from 1 PM to 4 PM today. Lift tickets are $25 daily for the last weekend. Thanks for a great season and thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
